campaign: Buctril Super Farmer Education Drive 2025 - Complete Media Library
description: Complete media collection for Buctril Super Farmer Education Drive Campaign 2025. All 104 media files mapped to 40 field sessions across 16 districts.
notes: Complete media inventory matching campaign sessions. All files use gallery/ folder paths.
